item.title: Complaint: Illinois Education Board Violates Title IX By Forcing Students To Share Restrooms With Opposite Sex
item.description: The Illinois State Board of Education (ISBE) and Chicago Public Schools (CPS) face a federal civil rights complaint challenging their policies that re...

item.title: 3 Arrested In Texas For Running Illegal Back-Alley Abortion Ring
item.description: Maria Rojas, Jose Ley, and Rubildo Matos were allegedly operating a network of Houston-area clinics providing illegal abortions.

item.title: Veterans Affairs Ends Distribution Of Taxpayer-Funded Chemical Castration Drugs
item.description: The Department of Veterans Affairs announced plans to 'phase out' distributing chemical castration drugs to trans-identifying veterans.

item.title: Exclusive: At Least 32 Rhode Island School Districts Lie To Parents About Children’s Gender Dysphoria
item.description: Allowing children to 'socially transition' at school pushes many of them toward seeking medical interventions like genital mutilation.

item.title: After Media’s Covid ‘Oopsie,’ I Don’t Want To Hear The Word ‘Misinformation’ Ever Again
item.description: Media gave air cover to censors by constructing artificial boundaries around acceptable thought and calling everything else 'misinformation.'
